actions.name: Terrorbird

cost.trigger: The user is in Flight or falling.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is in Flight or falling.

Effect: The user's attacks have their Power increased by 30%, and the user takes 20% less damage from Flying- and Rock-Type attacks.

system.description:
Trigger: The user is in Flight or falling.

Effect: The user's attacks have their Power increased by 30%, and the user takes 20% less damage from Flying- and Rock-Type attacks.
